summary: This document is a declaration by Robertson Kalonji, an employee of Wells Fargo Bank, certifying the authenticity of attached business records related to a legal order. It outlines the bank's procedures for maintaining records and notes that certain wire transactions could not be located within the requested timeframe.

persons.name: Robertson Kalonji
persons.context: Robertson Kalonji declares the authenticity of the attached documents and certifies that he is employed by Wells Fargo Bank in the Summons and Subpoenas Department.

keyFacts: Robertson Kalonji is an employee of Wells Fargo Bank, N.A.
The document certifies the authenticity of business records related to a legal order.
Certain wire transactions could not be located within the requested timeframe.
The bank's standard record retention period is seven years.
The declaration was executed in Charlotte, North Carolina.
